hero.headline: Our Services
hero.subline: From concept to completion — a seamless design experience.
hero.sublineCn: 从概念到完工——无缝的设计体验。

items.title: Full-Service Interior Design
items.description: Comprehensive design from initial concept through installation. Space planning, material selection, custom furnishings, and project management — all handled by our team.
items.descriptionCn: 从初步概念到安装的全面设计。空间规划、材料选择、定制家具和项目管理——全部由我们的团队负责。

items.title: Virtual Design
items.description: Remote design consultations with mood boards, space plans, and curated shopping lists — perfect for clients anywhere in the world.
items.descriptionCn: 远程设计咨询，提供情绪板、空间规划和精选购物清单——适合世界各地的客户。

items.title: Room Refresh
items.description: Targeted updates for a single room — new furniture, accessories, and styling to transform your space quickly.
items.descriptionCn: 针对单个房间的更新——新家具、配饰和造型，快速改变您的空间。

constructionServices.headline: Construction & Installation
constructionServices.body: Our in-house construction team ensures design integrity from plan to reality. Custom millwork, cabinetry, renovation management, and furniture assembly — all executed with precision.
constructionServices.bodyCn: 我们的内部施工团队确保设计从图纸到现实的完整性。定制木工、橱柜、翻新管理和家具组装——全部精准执行。

furnishingServices.headline: Furniture & Décor
furnishingServices.body: Access trade-only suppliers and competitive pricing through our purchasing program. We source furniture, lighting, textiles, and accessories — or shop our curated collection.
furnishingServices.bodyCn: 通过我们的采购计划，享受行业独家供应商和极具竞争力的价格。我们采购家具、灯具、纺织品和配饰——或选购我们的精选系列。

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We listen to your vision, understand your lifestyle, and discuss your budget.
steps.descriptionCn: 我们倾听您的愿景，了解您的生活方式，讨论您的预算。

steps.title: Design Concept
steps.description: Mood boards, space plans, and material palettes bring your vision to life.
steps.descriptionCn: 情绪板、空间规划和材料色板让您的愿景成为现实。

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Detailed drawings, specifications, and selections finalized.
steps.descriptionCn: 详细图纸、规格和选材定稿。

steps.title: Procurement
steps.description: Furniture, materials, and fixtures ordered at competitive prices.
steps.descriptionCn: 家具、材料和灯具以极具竞争力的价格订购。

steps.title: Installation
steps.description: Our construction team brings the design to life with precision.
steps.descriptionCn: 我们的施工团队精准地将设计变为现实。

steps.title: Reveal
steps.description: Your new space — styled, photographed, and ready to enjoy.
steps.descriptionCn: 您的新空间——造型完成、拍摄记录，等待享受。

cta.headline: Every great space starts with a conversation.
cta.headlineCn: 每一个精彩的空间，始于一次对话。
